10 #include "ucl_drone/pose_estimation.h"
11 
12 // Constructor
13 PoseEstimator::PoseEstimator()
14 {
15  // Subsribers
16  navdata_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/navdata");
17  navdata_sub = nh.subscribe(navdata_channel, 10, &PoseEstimator::navdataCb, this);
18  odometry_channel = nh.resolveName("ardrone/odometry");
19  odometry_sub = nh.subscribe(odometry_channel, 10, &PoseEstimator::odometryCb, this);
20 
21  // Publishers
22  pose_channel = nh.resolveName("ucl_drone/pose_estimation");
23  pose_pub = nh.advertise<ucl_drone::Pose3D>(pose_channel, 1); // 1 is size of output buffer (before send)
24 
25  // TODO : pose3D is in fact a geometry_msgs/Twist.msg (+velocities) --> check this
26 }
27 
28 // Destructor
29 PoseEstimator::~PoseEstimator()
30 {
31 }
32 
33 void PoseEstimator::publish_pose()
34 {
35  // instantiate the pose message
36  ucl_drone::Pose3D pose_msg;
37 
38  // fill metadata
39 
40  pose_msg.header.stamp = ros::Time().now(); // lastOdometryReceived.header.stamp;
41 
42  // pose_msg.header.frame_id = lastOdometryReceived.header.frame_id;
43 
44  // stupid recopying of odmometry \todo{do more}
45  pose_msg.x = lastOdometryReceived.pose.pose.position.x;
46  pose_msg.y = lastOdometryReceived.pose.pose.position.y;
47  pose_msg.z = lastOdometryReceived.pose.pose.position.z;
48  pose_msg.quatX = lastOdometryReceived.pose.pose.orientation.x;
49  pose_msg.quatY = lastOdometryReceived.pose.pose.orientation.y;
50  pose_msg.quatZ = lastOdometryReceived.pose.pose.orientation.z;
51  pose_msg.quatW = lastOdometryReceived.pose.pose.orientation.w;
52  pose_msg.xvel = lastOdometryReceived.twist.twist.linear.x;
53  pose_msg.yvel = lastOdometryReceived.twist.twist.linear.y;
54  pose_msg.zvel = lastOdometryReceived.twist.twist.linear.z;
55  pose_msg.rotXvel = lastOdometryReceived.twist.twist.angular.x;
56  pose_msg.rotYvel = lastOdometryReceived.twist.twist.angular.y;
57  pose_msg.rotZvel = lastOdometryReceived.twist.twist.angular.z;
58 
59  // publish
60  pose_pub.publish(pose_msg);
61  ROS_INFO("ucl_drone::pose_estimation Pose published");
62 
63  // convert Quaternions to roll, pitch, yaw:
64  // http://answers.unity3d.com/questions/416169/finding-pitchrollyaw-from-quaternions.html
65  // roll = Mathf.Atan2(2 * y * w - 2 * x * z, 1 - 2 * y * y - 2 * z * z);
66  // pitch = Mathf.Atan2(2 * x * w - 2 * y * z, 1 - 2 * x * x - 2 * z * z);
67  // yaw = Mathf.Asin(2 * x * y + 2 * z * w);
68 }
69 
70 void PoseEstimator::navdataCb(const ardrone_autonomy::Navdata::ConstPtr navdataPtr)
71 {
72  lastNavdataReceived = *navdataPtr;
73 }
74 
75 void PoseEstimator::odometryCb(const nav_msgs::Odometry::ConstPtr odometryPtr)
76 {
77  lastOdometryReceived = *odometryPtr;
78  // to see what exactly is put in Odometry: ardrone_driver.cpp line 698 to 713
79 }
80 
81 int main(int argc, char** argv)
82 {
83  ros::init(argc, argv, "pose_estimation");
84  PoseEstimator myPose;
85  ROS_INFO_STREAM("pose_estimation started!");
86  ros::Rate r(20);
87  while (ros::ok())
88  {
89  myPose.publish_pose();
90  ros::spinOnce(); // if we dont want this we have to place callback and services in threads
91  r.sleep();
92  }
93  return 0;
94 }
